mapper.select: SELECT r.id as id, r.uid as uid , r.mid as mid, r.star as star, r.text as text, r.regdate as regdate, abs(datediff(r.regdate,now())) as dday,c.name as name FROM reviews r INNER JOIN cust c ON c.id = r.uid where mid=#{mid}
SELECT TRUNCATE((TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(c.birth))/365,-1)as age,count(r.id) as rcnt FROM reviews r INNER JOIN cust c ON c.id = r.uid WHERE mid = #{mid} GROUP BY age
SELECT sex,ROUND((COUNT(r.id)/(SELECT COUNT(*)FROM reviews where mid = 1001)*100),1) AS rpercent FROM reviews r INNER JOIN cust c ON c.id = r.uid WHERE mid = 1001 GROUP BY sex
